channel.title: Comments on: Overlanding Uganda: gorillas, chimps and a lot of bananas

item.title: By: 10 things I loved about Kenya - DUFF'S SUITCASE
item.dc:creator: 10 things I loved about Kenya - DUFF'S SUITCASE
item.description: […] Last but not least, is Tusker beer. I can’t get enough of this great Kenyan brew – I even drank it when I was in Uganda. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Last but not least, is Tusker beer. I can’t get enough of this great Kenyan brew – I even drank it when I was in Uganda. […]

item.content:encoded: Nice article. Sounds like a great adventure.

item.title: By: Jim Harrington

item.description: Sarah. So awesome. Thanks for sharing . You are a legend.
